summary: This mod replaces shout animations with more cute ones.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff6c00][size=4][b]This mod replaces shout animations with more cute ones.[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[heading][color=#ff6c00]Features[/color][/heading][list]
[*]Wow, she's so lovely.
[*]Suit for Girlish Characters
[*](T)BBP Compatible
[/list]
[heading][color=#ff6c00]Quick Preview[/color][/heading][youtube]NayV12ARVV8[/youtube][youtube]n1-8mBv8Qqo[/youtube]
[heading][color=#ff6c00]Installation[/color][/heading][color=red]I strongly recommend you to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/]MO[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/]BAIN[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]NMM[/url] to install.[/color]

[MO and NMM user]
Activate and follow the instructions of installation wizard.

[BAIN User]
Open Installers tab, right click, select "Wizard", and follow the instructions of installation wizard.

[Manual]
Open the archive, choose NoBBP or BBP version, and copy "data" folder to your "Skyrim" directory.
Each hkx file should be placed in "Skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/animations/".

[heading][color=#ff6c00]Uninstallation[/color][/heading]This mod has no esp, no script, no havok behavior, so never dirty your save file.
[color=red]You can uninstall it whenever you want.[/color]

[MO and NMM user]
Simply deactivate this mod.

[BAIN User]
Open Installers tab, right click, select "Uninstall".

[Manual Uninstallation]
Delete the files you installed.

[heading][color=#ff6c00]Known Issues[/color][/heading][Critical Issues]
None, I believe. Because this mod is super simple.
If you find weird behaviors, please report at forum. Showing pictures or videos would be greatly appreciated.

[Minor Issues]
If you find weird behaviors, please report at forum.

-[color=red]All NPCs do the same animations. In short, if your character is male, he looks gay.
Some of you already know about [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/]FNIS' "Gender Specific Animation"[/url] option. But [b]as for shout animations, I don't recommend it.[/b][/color]
As a result of my test, there're so many glitches like weird transition of anim, zero cooldown time, and T-pose if you turn it on.

-[color=red]Inhale animation flickers sometimes. But even if you play in Vanilla, you see this problem. Consider as designed behavior.[/color]

-The arms do not move completely to the mouth when shout while walking/running.

[heading][color=#ff6c00]Changelog[/color][/heading]v1.1.0 2014-02-10
+Added crossbow_shoutoffset

v1.0.0 2014-01-26 (Initial Release)
+Added mt_shout, 1hm_shout, sneak1hm_shout animations
+Added mt_idle, 1hm_idle, sneakmtidle animations as omake

[heading][color=#ff6c00]Credit[/color][/heading]Yukl
web: http://yuklryvius.tumblr.com/
